src/parallel/zsc-3d-src/parameters.f File Reference

Detailed Description

Read input parameters from files "properties.in" and "discrete.in" and define constants for the simulation in the parallel D3Q7/D3Q19 Zheng-Shu-Chew multiphase LBM.

Data files are read from a single processor (master), broadcasted to all processors, and saved into local variables.

DISTRO determines if the bubbles are generated randomly using the parameters (xb,yb,zb) or following given positions: DISTRO == 1 -> Random bubble distribution DISTRO != 2 -> Given bubble positions
